# Let's roll!

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(jsonlite)
```

Load in the shapefile and map it

```{r}
df <- st_read("../../static/files/gis/wa_eco_l4/wa_eco_l4.shp")
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(df) + tm_polygons(alpha = 0.6)
```

Done!
